name: Trapped in the Storm
description:
Play as a fox who are trapped in a cabin with its cubs. 
The storm is unrelenting and mysterious creatures have noticed your helplessness.

Can you help them?

_______________________________________________________________________________________

This is a prototype where I want to find out how players behave with limited information in (hopefully) a spooky environment. 

Please scan the QR code and answer my survey or drop a comment below!

(Survey link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeqwVWxf0LdQ4sy-kRycymhuS__8A_KvFD7pwco...)

Thanks and happy halloween!

_______________________________________________________________________________________

This prototype us made with multiple assets from unity store like, Toon Fox and Rain Maker, and sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
